txt.en: '[placeholder], you have said yourself that on your missions around the Slag-hills, you have witnessed Orcs moving through bored holes in the earth. I believe there are many Orcs moving through these unnatural caverns. I ask of you to find an entrance to these caverns that will lead you to the Orcs which occupy them. Defeating them is our only hope of making safe passage for the Host of the West.'
Orcs can be found within the caverns of Skoironk.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs within Skoironk.
You have defeated many Orcs within the caverns of Skoironk and confirmed that a large group of the Enemy move below ground in the Slag-hills.
Thurindol believes that many more Orcs hide and wait for the Host of the West within the Maggot-hole caverns of Skoironk.
